SEARCH
Package entities

Class BrandManager

java.lang.Object
entities.User
entities.BrandManager
public class BrandManager extends User
Represents a brand manager in the influencer platform.

The BrandManager class extends the User class and provides functionalities for managing sponsorship budgets and offering sponsorships to influencers.

  • Constructor Details

    • BrandManager

      public BrandManager(String username, String password, String brandName, double sponsorshipBudget)
      Constructs a new BrandManager with the specified username, password, brand name, and sponsorship budget.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the brand manager.
      password - The password of the brand manager.
      brandName - The name of the brand managed by the brand manager.
      sponsorshipBudget - The initial budget available for sponsorships.

  • Method Details

    • getSponsorshipBudget

      public double getSponsorshipBudget()
      Returns the sponsorship budget available for this brand manager.
      Returns:
      The sponsorship budget.

    • displayMenu

      public void displayMenu()
      Displays the brand manager dashboard.

      This method prints a message indicating the brand manager's dashboard along with the brand name.

      Specified by:
      displayMenu in class User

    • offerSponsorship

      public Contract offerSponsorship(Influencer influencer, double amount) throws InsufficientBalanceException, PaymentFailedException
      Offers a sponsorship to an influencer.

      This method checks if the specified amount is within the available sponsorship budget. If the budget is insufficient, an InsufficientBalanceException is thrown. If the payment to the influencer fails, a PaymentFailedException is thrown. If successful, the method updates the budget and returns a new Contract.

      Parameters:
      influencer - The Influencer to whom the sponsorship is offered.
      amount - The amount of the sponsorship.
      Returns:
      A Contract representing the sponsorship agreement.
      Throws:
      InsufficientBalanceException - If the sponsorship amount exceeds the budget.
      PaymentFailedException - If the payment to the influencer fails.
